ModulePrefs.title: Dynamic Content Writer
ModulePrefs.description: A gadget to edit and view HTML in real time / a real-time HTML editor. More info: http://sites.google.com/site/mori79/html-gadgets/how-tos/dynamic-content-writer
ModulePrefs.author: Mori
ModulePrefs.author_aboutme: An English Teacher, a Google Sites Guru
ModulePrefs.author_quote: Follow your heart wherever it takes you.

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">
var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
var th = prefs.getString("textFieldHeight");
var fh = prefs.getString("frameHeight");
var tbc = prefs.getString("textFieldBackgroundColor");
var tfc = prefs.getString("textFieldFontColor");
var parentSource =
'<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \"-\/\/W3C\/\/DTD HTML 4.01 Frameset\/\/EN\" \"http:\/\/www.w3.org\/TR\/html4\/frameset.dtd\">' +
'<html>' +
'<head>' +
'<title>Parent document<\/title>' +
'<\/head>' +
'<frameset rows="' + th + ',' + fh + '">' +
'<frame name="editor" src="about:blank">' +
'<frame name="viewer" src="about:blank">' +
'<\/frameset>' +
'<\/html>';
var editorSource =
'<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \"-\/\/W3C\/\/DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional\/\/EN\" \"http:\/\/www.w3.org\/TR\/html4\/loose.dtd\">' +
'<html>' +
'<head>' +
'<title>Editor document<\/title>' +
'<style type="text/css">' +
'* {width:100%; height:100%; margin:0; border:0; background:' + tbc + '; font:10pt monospace; color:' + tfc + ';}' +
'html, body, form {padding:0;}' +
'textarea {overflow:auto; resize:none; box-sizing:border-box; -moz-box-sizing:border-box; padding:0.5em;}' +
'<\/style>' +
'<script type="text/javascript">' +
'var t;' +
'function updateViewer() {' +
'var v = window.parent.viewer.document;' +
'v.open();' +
'v.write(t.value);' +
'v.close();' +
'}' +
'function getFocus() {' +
'if (t.value == t.defaultValue) {' +
't.value = "";' +
'updateViewer();' +
'}' +
'}' +
'function loseFocus() {' +
'if (t.value == "") {' +
't.value = t.defaultValue;' +
'updateViewer();' +
'}' +
'}' +
'window.onload = function() {' +
't = document.f.ta;' +
'updateViewer();' +
'}' +
'<\/script>' +
'<\/head>' +
'<body>' +
'<form name="f" method="get" onsubmit="return false;" action="">' +
'<textarea rows="1" cols="1" oninput="updateViewer();" onpropertychange="updateViewer();" onfocus="getFocus();" onblur="loseFocus();" name="ta" spellcheck="false"><p>Embed code in the text field above and see the result in the frame below.</p><\/textarea>' +
'<\/form>' +
'<\/body>' +
'<\/html>';
function updateEditor() {
var e = window.editor.document;
e.open();
e.write(editorSource);
e.close();
}
function writeParent() {
document.open();
document.write(parentSource);
document.close();
}
window.onload = function() {
writeParent();
updateEditor();
}
</script>
